biocontainers.name: yacrd
biocontainers.summary: Yet Another Chimeric Read Detector, with long-read mapper result as input.

biotools.summary:
upstream tools for long-read genome assembly.

Long Read mapping tools provides all match they found in read dataset, for many usage some of match aren't usfull, this programme provide some filter to remove it. This soft can be replace by a simple script in awk, bash, python.

bioschemas.name: yacrd
